xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Mail Archive Translations
xwikidoc.content:
# ---- Pages ---- # Home page mailarchive.home.title=Mailing-lists Archive Application mailarchive.home.abstract=This application aims at storing and showing mailing-lists archives. To know what mailing-lists are available, and what types of mails are configured, please check the [[legend>>MailArchive.Legend]]. # Administration page mailarchive.admin.title=Mail Archive Administration # Loading page mailarchive.load.title=Mailing-lists emails loading mailarchive.load.abstract=This page will allow you to manually load emails from your configured sources (mailboxes or stores), and to assign parameters to be used for the loading job(s).
A "default" loading session is configured to load emails from all configured servers with some default options. "Disabled" servers are never taken into account, even if they are part of a loading session. mailarchive.load.load.submit=Load mailarchive.load.check.submit=Check mailarchive.load.switch.submit=Switch State mailarchive.load.table.headers.source=Source Configuration mailarchive.load.table.headers.state=Enabled ? mailarchive.load.table.headers.status=Availability mailarchive.load.table.headers.available=Nb Mails available mailarchive.load.table.headers.actions=Actions # ---- Objects and Livetables ---- # (mails) XClass MailArchiveCode.MailClass MailArchiveCode.MailClass_topicsubject=Topic MailArchiveCode.MailClass_topicid=Topic ID MailArchiveCode.MailClass_messagesubject=Subject MailArchiveCode.MailClass_messageid=Message ID MailArchiveCode.MailClass_date=Date MailArchiveCode.MailClass_body=Body MailArchiveCode.MailClass_from=From MailArchiveCode.MailClass_to=To MailArchiveCode.MailClass_cc=CC MailArchiveCode.MailClass_references=References MailArchiveCode.MailClass_inreplyto=InReplyTo ID MailArchiveCode.MailClass_bodyhtml=HTML Body MailArchiveCode.MailClass_attachedMails=Attached Mails MailArchiveCode.MailClass_type=Mail Type MailArchiveCode.MailClass_sensitivity=Sensitivity # (topics) XClass MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass_topicid=Topic ID MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass_subject=Subject MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass_startdate=Created MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass_lastupdatedate=Last Updated MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass_status=Status MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass_author=Author MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass_sensitivity=Sensitivity MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass_type=Topic Type # (lists) XClass MailArchiveCode.ListsSettingsClass ## XObject MailArchiveCode.ListsSettingsClass_displayname=Display name MailArchiveCode.ListsSettingsClass_pattern=Pattern to match from recipients MailArchiveCode.ListsSettingsClass_Tag=Tag MailArchiveCode.ListsSettingsClass_color=Color MailArchiveCode.ListsSettingsClass_listId=List ID ## Sheet Form mailarchive.lists.fields.displayname.label=$msg.get('MailArchiveCode.ListsSettingsClass_displayname') mailarchive.lists.fields.pattern.label=$msg.get('MailArchiveCode.ListsSettingsClass_pattern') mailarchive.lists.fields.Tag.label=$msg.get('MailArchiveCode.ListsSettingsClass_Tag') mailarchive.lists.fields.color.label=$msg.get('MailArchiveCode.ListsSettingsClass_color') mailarchive.lists.fields.color.hint=Enter the value as for {0}CSS color properties{1}. mailarchive.lists.fields.listId.label=$msg.get('MailArchiveCode.ListsSettingsClass_listId') mailarchive.lists.fields.listId.hint=Optionnally referring to the List-ID identifying this list, will allow replying, subscribing and unsubscribing from this list. # (types) XClass MailArchiveCode.TypesSettingsClass ## XObject MailArchiveCode.TypesSettingsClass_id=ID MailArchiveCode.TypesSettingsClass_name=Display name MailArchiveCode.TypesSettingsClass_icon=Icon MailArchiveCode.TypesSettingsClass_builtin=Built-in type ? MailArchiveCode.TypesSettingsClass_matchersComposition=Matchers relation-ship MailArchiveCode.TypesSettingsClass_matchersComposition_and=AND MailArchiveCode.TypesSettingsClass_matchersComposition_or=OR ## Sheet Form mailarchive.types.fields.id.label=$msg.get('MailArchiveCode.TypesSettingsClass_id') mailarchive.types.fields.name.label=$msg.get('MailArchiveCode.TypesSettingsClass_name') mailarchive.types.fields.builtin.label=$msg.get('MailArchiveCode.TypesSettingsClass_builtin') mailarchive.types.fields.icon.label=$msg.get('MailArchiveCode.TypesSettingsClass_icon') mailarchive.types.fields.icon.hint=Enter the name of an icon from {0}XWiki Icon Set{1}. mailarchive.types.fields.matchersComposition.label==$msg.get('MailArchiveCode.TypesSettingsClass_matchersComposition') mailarchive.types.fields.matchersComposition.hint=Choose the condition that applies between defined matchers (only valid of course if more than 1 matcher is defined). # (matchers) XClass MailArchiveCode.MailMatcherClass ## XObject MailArchiveCode.MailMatcherClass_fields=Fields MailArchiveCode.MailMatcherClass_expression=Expression MailArchiveCode.MailMatcherClass_isAdvanced=Advanced mode MailArchiveCode.MailMatcherClass_isIgnoreCase=Ignore case MailArchiveCode.MailMatcherClass_isMultiLine=Match multiple lines ## Sheet Form mailarchive.matchers.fields.fields.label=$msg.get('MailArchiveCode.MailMatcherClass_fields') mailarchive.matchers.fields.expression.label=$msg.get('MailArchiveCode.MailMatcherClass_expression') mailarchive.matchers.fields.expression.hint=A pattern to match against selected fields. mailarchive.matchers.fields.isAdvanced.label=$msg.get('MailArchiveCode.MailMatcherClass_isAdvanced') mailarchive.matchers.fields.isAdvanced.hint=Toggles matching mode, between 'advanced' ('expression' is a regular expression) and 'normal' ('expression' must be contained in selected field(s)). mailarchive.matchers.fields.isIgnoreCase.label=$msg.get('MailArchiveCode.MailMatcherClass_isIgnoreCase') mailarchive.matchers.fields.isMultiLine.label=$msg.get('MailArchiveCode.MailMatcherClass_isMultiLine') # (loading session) XClass MailArchiveCode.LoadingSessionClass ## XObject MailArchiveCode.LoadingSessionClass_id=Session ID MailArchiveCode.LoadingSessionClass_maxMailsNb=Max number of mails to load in a session MailArchiveCode.LoadingSessionClass_withDelete=Delete mails after successful load MailArchiveCode.LoadingSessionClass_loadAll=Load all mails (including already read mails) MailArchiveCode.LoadingSessionClass_debugMode=Debug Mode MailArchiveCode.LoadingSessionClass_simulationMode=Simulate MailArchiveCode.LoadingSessionClass_recentMails=Focus on Recent mails ## Sheet Form mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.id.label=Session ID mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.maxMailsNb.label=Max number of mails to load in a session mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.debugMode.label=Debug Mode mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.simulationMode.label=Simulate mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.loadAll.label=Load all mails (including already read mails) mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.recentMails.label=Focus on Recent mails mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.withDelete.label=Delete mails after successful load mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.servers.label=List of Server sources mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.stores.label=List of Store sources mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.maxMailsNb.hint=Enter -1 to load all mails - can take a very long time depending on number of emails. mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.servers.hint=If no server and no store is selected, that means "all servers" (but not "all stores"). mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.simulationMode.hint=In simulation mode, mails are loaded but their flags are not changed (they're left unread) and no pages are created in the wiki. mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.loadAll.hint=Do not load only unread mails, but all available mails (up to the limit). mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.withDelete.hint=If true, will delete emails after reading them. Be careful with this one unless you know you can get rid of read mails. mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.debugMode.hint=In debug mode, additionnal logs are output (without need to restart the wiki) and .eml files are dumped out of each loaded email. mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.maxMailsNb.hint=The maximum number of emails to load during a loading session. Should be adapted to the loading frequency, if you schedule that loading session. ## Livetable headers mailarchive.loadingSessions.table.headers.id=ID mailarchive.loadingSessions.table.headers.maxMailsNb=Limit mailarchive.loadingSessions.table.headers.debugMode=Debug ? mailarchive.loadingSessions.table.headers.simulationMode=Simulate ? mailarchive.loadingSessions.table.headers.loadAll=All ? mailarchive.loadingSessions.table.headers.recentMails=Recent ? mailarchive.loadingSessions.table.headers.withDelete=Delete ? mailarchive.loadingSessions.table.headers.servers=Servers mailarchive.loadingSessions.table.headers.stores=Stores mailarchive.loadingSessions.table.headers.emptyvalue=(default) mailarchive.loadingSessions.table.headers._actions=Actions # Archive livetable column headers mailarchive.topics.table.headers.subject=Subject mailarchive.topics.table.headers.startdate=Created mailarchive.topics.table.headers.lastupdatedate=Updated mailarchive.topics.table.headers.count=Messages mailarchive.topics.table.headers.author=Author mailarchive.topics.table.headers.emptyvalue=unknown mailarchive.topics.table.headers._ratings=Ratings # Servers mailarchive.servers.table.headers.id=ID mailarchive.servers.table.headers.hostname=Host Name mailarchive.servers.table.headers.protocol=Protocol mailarchive.servers.table.headers.folder=Folder mailarchive.servers.table.headers.user=Account mailarchive.servers.table.headers.status=Status mailarchive.servers.table.headers.state=State mailarchive.servers.table.headers._actions=Actions mailarchive.servers.table.headers.emptyvalue=n/a mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.ok=Ok mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.-1=Authentication failed mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.-2=Connection error mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.-3=Illegal State mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.-4=Unexpected error mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.-5=Folder not found mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.-6=Unknown Host mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.-7=Unknown Error mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.-8=Invalid Configuration mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.description.ok=Successfully connected, there are {0} unread messages on this server / folder. mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.description.-1=Authentication failed, check your account settings, or need for a specific certificate for Javamail. mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.description.-2=Could not connect to this server, check logs for more details. mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.description.-3=Illegal state, maybe a previous connection was not properly closed. mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.description.-4=Unexpected exception occurred, check logs for more details. mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.description.-5=Folder was not found, check it exists and is correctly spelled. mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.description.-6=Unknown host : check host name is correctly spelled, and that this host is accessible from this server. mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.description.-7=An unknown error occurred, check logs for more details. mailarchive.servers.connectionStatus.description.-8=Invalid Configuration # Stores mailarchive.stores.table.headers.id=ID mailarchive.stores.table.headers.format=Format mailarchive.stores.table.headers.location=Location mailarchive.stores.table.headers.folder=Folder mailarchive.stores.table.headers.status=Status mailarchive.stores.table.headers.state=State mailarchive.stores.table.headers._actions=Actions mailarchive.stores.table.headers.emptyvalue=n/a # Lists mailarchive.lists.table.headers.displayname=Display Name mailarchive.lists.table.headers.pattern=Pattern mailarchive.lists.table.headers.Tag=Tag mailarchive.lists.table.headers.color=Colour mailarchive.lists.table.headers.listId=List-ID mailarchive.lists.table.headers._actions=Actions mailarchive.lists.table.headers.emptyvalue=n/a # Types mailarchive.types.table.headers.name=Display Name mailarchive.types.table.headers.id=ID mailarchive.types.table.headers.builtin=Built-in ? mailarchive.types.table.headers.icon=Icon mailarchive.types.table.headers._actions=Actions mailarchive.types.table.headers.emptyvalue=n/a ## ---- mailarchive_loading_action_simulate=Simulate #@deprecated mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.loadAll.label mailarchive_loading_action_readflag=Load all mails (including already read mails) #@deprecated mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.recentMails.label mailarchive_loading_action_recentflag=Focus on Recent mails #@deprecated mailarchive.loadingSession.fields.withDelete.label mailarchive_loading_action_delete=Delete mails after successful load #@deprecated mailarchive.load.load.submit mailarchive_loading_action_load=Load #@deprecated mailarchive.load.check.submit mailarchive_loading_action_check=Check #@deprecated mailarchive.load.switch.submit mailarchive_loading_action_switch=Switch State #@deprecated mailarchive.admin.title mailarchive_settings_title=Settings for the Mail Archive application #@deprecated mailarchive.home.title mailarchive_home_title=Mailing-lists Archive Application #@deprecated mailarchive.home.abstract mailarchive_home_description=This application aims at mirroring mailing-lists, and allowing you to browse them by subject / mail, or find these topics by using the basic wiki search. Please find the list below - it's updated regularly, please come back later if you don't see a recent mail. #@deprecated mailarchive.load.title mailarchive_loading_title=Mailing-lists eMail Loading #@deprecated mailarchive.load.abstract mailarchive_loading_description=This page will allow you to load emails from your configured mailbox(es). Simulation will do everything except effectively saving mails and topics pages. Checking debug mode allows to set log level to DEBUG for this loading session.
